title: What if We Could All Control A.I.?
description: Researchers at Anthropic asked roughly 1,000 Americans to write rules for their A.I. chatbot. The results could be a model for future kinds of A.I. governance.

title: What Happens When an Artist’s Technology Becomes Obsolete?
description: Curators and conservators are working to save — and update — art made with aging hardware.
